GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
soc: qcom: ocmem: Fix refcount leak in of_get_ocmem

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 84a928b44cb303d5756e3bff2734921de8dce4f6, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit 88c1e9404f1deee02e52d13aae3d9ee2cabd66f5. For more details please see the references link.
